scripts.prepack:all: for dir in contracts/*/; do CONTRACT=$(basename $dir) npm run prepack:contract || exit 1; done
scripts.prepack:contract: test -n "$CONTRACT" || (echo '❌ Error: CONTRACT environment variable is required. Usage: CONTRACT=mycontract npm run prepack:contract' && exit 1) && rm -rf ./contracts/$CONTRACT/out && npm run prepack:asc && npm run prepack:tsc
scripts.produce: test -n "$CONTRACT" || (echo '❌ Error: CONTRACT environment variable is required. Usage: CONTRACT=mycontract npm run produce' && exit 1) && deno run -A ./run/src/mods/produce/mod.ts ./contracts/$CONTRACT/out/mod.wasm
scripts.docs: npm run docs:contracts && npm run docs:catalog
scripts.docs:contract: test -n "$CONTRACT" || (echo '❌ Error: CONTRACT environment variable is required. Usage: CONTRACT=mycontract npm run docs:contract' && exit 1) && deno run -A ./run/src/mods/docs/contract/mod.ts
scripts.docs:contracts: for dir in contracts/*/; do CONTRACT=$(basename $dir) npm run docs:contract || exit 1; done
